entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a character who is being addressed by Harry. He is described as someone who would probably turn them in to Percy if they told him about the detention for blackmail.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone that Ron would probably turn in if he knew about the detention. He is described as someone who would do a Crouch and turn them in.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as having an owl that departed through a window. He is not further described in this context.

entities.name: georges
entities.description: Georges is mentioned as having an owl that departed with Fred's. He is not further described in this context.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a character who is addressing Ron and Hermione. He suggests that they should give Professor Moody till break before going to see him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is tired and wants to go see Professor Moody. She suggests it might be too early to do so.

entities.name: professor moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is mentioned as a teacher who would probably blast them through the door if they woke him up at dawn.

relationships.description: Ron would probably turn them in to Percy if he knew about the detention.
Harry suggests that they should give Professor Moody till break before going to see him.
Hermione wants to go see Professor Moody, but thinks it might be too early to do so.
Harry is addressing Ron in the conversation.
